  • Method Details

    • signup

      public java.lang.String signup​(java.lang.String... args)
      Description copied from interface: Command
      Allows a certain user to signup to our SplitWise app.
      Specified by:
      signup in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - An array of argument which contains 2 elements: the username and the password which the user has chosen to sing up with.
      Returns:
      [Unknown command] if the number of argument is not 2 or "successful registration" if the singing up is successful or "invalid username" if the chosen username is less than 8 characters or "invalid password" if the chosen password is less than 8 characters or "username already exists" if there is another user with the chosen username

    • login

      public java.lang.String login​(java.lang.String... args1)
      Specified by:
      login in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args1 - An array of argument which contains 2 elements: the username and the password which the user has chosen to log in with.
      Returns:
      [Unknown command] if the number of argument is not 2 or "Invalid username" if there is no user with the chosen username or an appropriate message for the successful logging in

      Specified by:
      getStatus in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - An array of argument which contains 1 element: the username of the user who want to see his current status
      Returns:
      the current status of the particular user

    • split

      public java.lang.String split​(java.lang.String... args)
      Specified by:
      split in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - An array of argument which contains 4 elements: the username of the user how want to split a certain bill, the username of the other user who has to pay the bill, the amount of the bill and at least 1 word for the reason of payment
      Returns:
      "[ Invalid number of arguments in command split ]" if the number of argument is less than 4 "You successfully split the bill!" if the splitting of the bill was successful

    • payed

      public java.lang.String payed​(java.lang.String... args)
      Specified by:
      payed in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - An array of argument which contains 3 elements: the username of the user who has payed the bill, the username of the user who has return the certain amount of money, the amount the second user has returned
      Returns:
      "[ Invalid number of arguments in command payed ]" if the number of argument is not 3 or an appropriate message for the state of the payment

    • splitGroup

      public java.lang.String splitGroup​(java.lang.String... args)
      Specified by:
      splitGroup in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - an array of argument which contains 4 elements: the username of the user who has payed the bill, the name of the group the certain user wants to split the bill with, the amount of the bill, the reason of the payment
      Returns:
      "[ Invalid number of arguments in command split-group ]" if the number of arguments is not 4 or an appropriate message for the state of the splitting the bill

    • createGroup

      public java.lang.String createGroup​(java.lang.String... args)
      Specified by:
      createGroup in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - an array of argument which contains at least 4 elements: the username of the user who wants to create the group, the name of the group and at least 2 other username of users who will participate in the group.
      Returns:
      an appropriate message for the state of the creation of the group

    • payedGroupMember

      public java.lang.String payedGroupMember​(java.lang.String... args)
      Specified by:
      payedGroupMember in interface Command
      Parameters:
      args - an array of argument which contains at least 4 elements: the username of the user who want to note that a certain member of a group has payed his debt
      Returns:
      an appropriate message for the state of notting a payment from a particular member of a certain group
